trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MonthChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event is raised when the user clicks the navigation controls for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control to display the next or previous month.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>就會引發事件，當使用者按一下瀏覽控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項來顯示一個或下一個月份。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MonthChangedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MonthChangedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged> event that displays in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label> control whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control has moved forward or backward one month.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.VisibleMonthChanged>中顯示的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>控制項是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制項已移往前或往後的一個月。
